titleStmt.title: An answer to a letter of a Iesuit named Tyrie, be Iohne Knox
Answer to a letter of a Jesuit named Tyrie.
titleStmt.author: Knox, John, ca. 1514-1572.

notesStmt.note: Contains a letter written to his mother-in-law, Elizabeth Bowes, in 1554.
Reprinted and answered in: Tyrie, James. The refutation of ane ansuer made be schir Johne Knox. STC 24476.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
